message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.  I believe this reflects its true worth and potential.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $1,000,000 is quite a bit below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to offer $1,200,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
